title: The List Conspiracy
description: Wallis Jones needs to fight for her family. The happy wife, mother and lawyer finds herself at the middle of a web of conspiracy. Her clients and friends are being stalked by a shadow organization and in the end, the Black Widow's own son might be involved. When a stranger arrives in Wallis' driveway she learns of a daring enlistment strategy known as the Butterfly Project. Caught in the crosshairs, Wallis must uncover the hidden meaning behind the names on the list the stranger provided.Can Wallis find a way to uncover the truth and expose the real powers before more lives are lost? Or will she lose the one case that matters most? With clandestine meetings, coded messages, and so much more, Wallis Jones leads you on an action-packed adventure that will make you root for good over evil.After all, there is always hope.***This series is meant to be read starting with Book One and the twisty plot unfolds over the course of all of the books.Follow Wallis Jones in Martha Carr's intriguing new thriller, The List Conspiracy - first book in the Wallis Jones series!If you're a fan of Dan Brown, Andy McNab, or Robert Ludlum then you're not going to want to miss The List Conspiracy, the first installment to Martha Carr's new Wallis Jones Series!
author: Martha Carr
